name: Diapers
description:
Client is a single parent of 2 children, a 13-year-old daughter and a 10-year-old son who is diagnosed with autism, non-verbal and fully dependent on client for daily activities such as feeding, bathing, and other personal care. Client has been the sole breadwinner of the family and has only been able to explore ad-hoc employment in view that she is the sole caregiver to her son.

Client is hoping to seek interim diapers assistance for her son whilst exploring sustainable alternatives with formal supports in alleviating the financial and caregiving stress that she has been experiencing.  

Quantity: 4-8 packs of Pamper Sensi Night Pants Junior Children's Diapers Pants 4XL

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre – Hougang and Buangkok
contact.name: Odelia Tan

name: Bed
description:
Client (M/79) is single who lives alone in a 1rm rental flat, with an unsteady gait, requiring a walking stick for ambulation at home. He also experiences blurred vision and has potential fall risks, resulting in him being homebound for his safety.

Client’s current bed frame is in poor condition. It appears old, discoloured (yellowish), rusty, and stained with black spots. Given his mobility challenges and visual impairment, having a proper and stable bed frame will be beneficial for him. It would provide safer support, reduce fall risks, and improve his home hygiene and overall living environment. 

In view of this, we would like to request assistance in sourcing a new donated bed frame for client to enhance his safety and living environment.

name: Bicycle
description:
Sunbeam Place @ Children’s Society is requesting 2 medium-sized bicycles suitable for children aged 10 years and above.
These bicycles will be used to teach residents how to ride and for their general use.

Delivery will need to be arranged by the kind donor.
If you wish to contribute, please click “Donate”, and we will get in touch with you soon.

We sincerely thank you for your kindness and generosity in advance.

name: Tablet
description:
"The client is the primary caregiver for her two school-going teenage children. She is currently medically unfit for work due to physical and mental health concerns and is in the midst of divorce proceedings. At present, she has no source of income. Despite her financial challenges, the client continues to meet household expenses and provide for her children through external family support and donations. 

The client is seeking assistance for a tablet to support her children’s educational needs. The device is necessary for school assignments, accessing online learning platforms, and completing home-based learning tasks. Due to her lack of income and ongoing financial strain, she is unable to afford a laptop on her own. For further information, please contact Seelvi at 8699 3152 or via email at seelvi.nadarasan@thkmc.org.sg. Thank you."

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Norlizawati Binte Hamid
